reviews.review_msg: He is by far one of the most clear/concise profs ever. The i clickers instead of the midterm was a great idea. The lectures are the same as the textbook but go to gain i clicker marks. Overall i found him to be a great prof and he paced the course well! Your experience in this course might also depend on TA, mine was god sent angel!
Do not recommend for ANY psych class. Very boring, reads from the textbook. Has nothing interesting to offer. Gives iclicker quizzes for every lecture so people will turn up.

One of the most honest professor in the whole school! He is very strict but really really nice person. If you put in the hours to study, you'll do fine on the exams. The essays are marked very strict, but its 40%, so put your effort! Text book is a must n lectures are also a must!

well, he is great if you find him for help on the research paper. he applied lots of restriction on the paper, so if you can't think psychologically, don't take this class, you will be suffering on searching for relevant idea and getting it passed.

Best TA I had this semester!! Daniella's very friendly and kind. She's passionate about the course material and really cared about all her students. She was also very helpful and very easy to approach. And she responds to emails fairly quickly.

Best TA I had this semester!! Daniella's very friendly and kind. She's passionate about the course material and really cared about all her students. She was also very helpful and very easy to approach. And she responded to emails fairly quickly.
Awesome TA! She was very passionate about the course material and loved teaching all her students. She was also very helpful and very easy to to approach.
